Language.message2: Click \"Agree\" to sign in to www.appdirect.com using your Yahoo ID and allow sharing of Yahoo info.
Language.message4: We've got what your business needs, including accounting, CRM, project management and more.
Language.message7: Fast and friendly help to get you going fast.
Language.message9: Log in to all of your apps through a rock solid portal.
Language.message10: Get it all with no extra charge, ever.
